attributes.action: increase pressure on Muslim communities to do all they can in order to bring any possible terrorists and terrorist plots to be known to police, security services and the general public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the arrest of the doctors of Muslim faith, it is now time for the Muslim communites to stand up and be counted in the fight against terrorism. I find it inconceivable that are not those within Muslim communities who do not know of such plotting, who could not come forward so as to prevent further attacks against Britain

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
